item.title: Comment on Germany chart of the day by Tom Meadowcroft
item.description:
Expensive energy due to poor policy choices that continue today.
No raw materials other than global supplies.
No young consumers
Skilled part of the workforce is aging/retiring
Low infrastructure investment for a generation

The whole country risks becoming a rust belt
How will Europe cope without Germany paying the bills?

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/11/germany-chart-of-the-day.html?commentID=160840506

Post URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/11/germany-chart-of-the-day.html?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=germany-chart-of-the-day
